name: June Suswa!
greetingText: Najua nimechelewa kusema lakini si ati nilisahau 😂
wishText: June, nakuwish life ikuwe smooth, na blessings zikufollow kila siku. Uko 18+ sasa, so hii ni mwanzo ya good vibes na opportunities mob. Na juu wewe ni neighbor pia, najua hii mwaka lazima ikuwe special 🥳
text1: Cieee June, hii ndio ile gift nilikuambia iko on the way 🔥
textInChatBox: Happy belated birthday June!! Nakutakia joy, love na success kwa kila kitu unachase 🎂
text2: Nilikuwa karibu nikupee text tu kawaida…
text4: So nikatengeneza hii website as your gift
text5Content: June ni mtu worth zaidi ya tu ‘HBD lol’ text 😂
outroText: Hope hii gift imekufurahisha June 😜. Hii ni memory ya 18+ yako, na natumai itakuwa mwaka wa blessings mob na story safi 🎉
